mapper.select: SELECT * FROM conference WHERE date = #{date} AND visible=1
SELECT * FROM conference WHERE tags LIKE '%${tags}%' AND visible=1
SELECT * FROM conference WHERE match(name, organization, introduction) AGAINST (#{keywords}) AND visible=1 LIMIT ${limit} OFFSET ${offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM conference WHERE match(name, organization, introduction) AGAINST (#{keywords}) AND visible=1
SELECT * FROM conference WHERE conference_id=${conference_id} AND (establisher_id=#{user_id} OR visible=1)
SELECT * FROM conference WHERE establisher_id=${user_id} OR visible=1
SELECT * FROM session WHERE session_id=${session_id} AND (establisher_id=#{user_id} OR (visible=1 AND conference_visible=1))
SELECT * FROM paper WHERE paper_id=${paper_id} AND (establisher_id=${user_id} OR (visible=1 AND conference_visible=1 AND session_visible=1))
SELECT * FROM paper WHERE session_id=${session_id} AND ((visible=1 AND conference_visible=1 AND session_visible=1) OR establisher_id=${user_id})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_conference (user_id, conference_id, uctype) SELECT #{id}, #{conference_id}, #{uctype} FROM dual WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM user_conference WHERE (user_id, conference_id, uctype) = (#{id}, #{conference_id}, #{uctype}))

INSERT INTO session (topic, description, start_time, end_time, reporters, rating, conference_id, visible, conference_visible) VALUES (#{topic}, #{description}, #{start_time}, #{end_time}, #{reporters}, ${rating}, ${conference_id}, ${visible}, ${conference_visible})

INSERT INTO paper (title, authors, abstr, content, session_id, establisher_id, visible, session_visible, conference_visible) VALUES (#{title}, #{authors}, #{abstr}, #{content}, ${session_id}, ${establisher_id}, ${visible}, ${session_visible}, ${conference_visible})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM user_conference WHERE (user_id, conference_id, uctype) = (#{id}, #{conference_id}, #{uctype})
